snippet: As refugees appealed for Western military intervention, Secretary of State John Kerry’s visit became a graphic illustration of the limits of Washington policy.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry tours refugee camp in Zaatari, Jordan, to take stock of humanitarian crisis caused by bitter fighting in neighboring Syria; he also highlights American efforts to provide aid; visit becomes graphic illustration of limits of Washington policy as frustrated refugees appeal for Western action, not just words.
lead_paragraph: As refugees appealed for Western military intervention, Secretary of State John Kerry’s visit became a graphic illustration of the limits of Washington policy.

headline.main: Touring Refugee Camp, Kerry Sees Mounting Syrian Suffering
headline.print_headline: Touring Refugee Camp, Kerry Sees Suffering Mount for Syrians

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
